Developer Interface¶

PySCAD now implements almost all of the functionality of ‘2D’, ‘3D’, ‘Transformations’ and ‘Boolean operations’ in the cheetsheet of OpenSCAD., and is listed below.

Objects¶

The objects includes the a base class Node in PySCAD, and ‘2D’ and ‘3D’ objects in OpenSCAD, which are:

  • node
    • Node
  • circle
    • Circle
